itemLabel: Charles Beauclerk, 13th Duke of St Albans

wikipedia_page.main: Charles Frederick Aubrey de Vere Beauclerk, 13th Duke of St Albans, OBE (16 August 1915 – 8 October 1988) was a British soldier and peer.

link_mentions.page: Murray Beauclerk, 14th Duke of St Albans
response: The only child (by his first wife) and eldest son of Charles Beauclerk, 13th Duke of St Albans, the 14th Duke descends from King Charles II and Nell Gwyn by their illegitimate son, Charles Beauclerk, 1st Duke of St Albans. He is also the senior representative of the De Vere family.
*Charles Beauclerk, 13th Duke of St Albans, OBE (1915–1988), English peer and British Army officer
* Charles Beauclerk, 13th Duke of St Albans (1915–1988), British peer
*Suzanne Beauclerk, Duchess of St Albans (1921-2010), wife of Charles Beauclerk, 13th Duke of St Albans
